name: Inn at Sugar Bowl

reviews.text: A friend and I spent one night at the Inn at Sugar late in the ski season and got a great deal that included two lift tickets and breakfast.
reviews.title: Amazing Classic Slopeside Resort

likes.liked: — Location, impeccable service, nice rooms with great views.
likes.disliked: — Non-existant apres ski or nightlife, but very little not to like.

aka: Inn At Sugar Bowl Hotel Norden
